nodes.documentation:
@title Credit contract.
Inherits the Ownable and Destructible contracts.
nodes.name: Credit
Credit
invest

nodes.documentation:
@dev Repayment function.
Allows borrower to make repayment installments.
nodes.name: repay

nodes.documentation:
@dev Withdraw function.
It can only be executed while contract is in active state.
It is only accessible to the borrower.
It is only accessible if the needed amount is gathered in the contract.
It can only be executed once.
Transfers the gathered amount to the borrower.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Request interest function.
It can only be executed while contract is in active state.
It is only accessible to lenders.
It is only accessible if lender funded 1 or more wei.
It can only be executed once.
Transfers the lended amount + interest to the lender.
nodes.name: requestInterest
getCreditInfo

nodes.documentation: @dev Function for voting the borrower as fraudster.
nodes.name: fraudVote
fraud
changeState
toggleActive

params._state: New state. Only accessible to the owner of the contract. Changes the state of the contract.

fraudVote().details: Function for voting the borrower as fraudster.

getCreditInfo().details: Function to get the whole credit information.

invest().details: Invest function. Provides functionality for person to invest in someone's credit, incentivised by the return of interest.

repay().details: Repayment function. Allows borrower to make repayment installments.

requestInterest().details: Request interest function. It can only be executed while contract is in active state. It is only accessible to lenders. It is only accessible if lender funded 1 or more wei. It can only be executed once. Transfers the lended amount + interest to the lender.

toggleActive().details: Toggle active state function. Only accessible to the owner of the contract. Toggles the active state of the contract.

withdraw().details: Withdraw function. It can only be executed while contract is in active state. It is only accessible to the borrower. It is only accessible if the needed amount is gathered in the contract. It can only be executed once. Transfers the gathered amount to the borrower.

devdoc.title: Credit contract. Inherits the Ownable and Destructible contracts.
